title: Creates the business outreach center network assistance program
summary: Creates the business outreach center (BOC) network assistance program within the department of economic development, and provides for its functions, powers and duties; establishes a reporting requirement by the commissioner of economic development.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2266

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M. of A. MORELLE, CYMBROWITZ, SWEENEY -- Multi-Sponsored
         by -- M. of A.  WEINSTEIN -- read once and referred to  the  Committee
         on Economic Development, Job Creation, Commerce and Industry

       AN  ACT  to  amend the economic development law, in relation to creating
         the business outreach center network assistance program

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  The  economic  development law is amended by adding a new
    2  article 9-B to read as follows:
    3                                  ARTICLE 9-B
    4          BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTER (BOC) NETWORK ASSISTANCE PROGRAM
    5  SECTION 216. LEGISLATIVE FINDINGS AND OBJECTIVES.
    6          217. BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTERS.
    7          218. REPORTING REQUIREMENT.
    8    S 216. LEGISLATIVE FINDINGS AND OBJECTIVES. THE LEGISLATURE FINDS THAT
    9  AN INNOVATIVE APPROACH TO SUPPORTING  SMALL  BUSINESS  DEVELOPMENT,  THE
   10  "BUSINESS  OUTREACH  CENTER  (BOC)  NETWORK", IS ONE OF A DOZEN NATIONAL
   11  ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT MODELS THAT HAS BEEN FOUND TO BE "WORTHY  OF  STUDY
   12  AND  REPLICATION".  ACCORDINGLY,  THE LEGISLATURE DECLARES ITS INTENT TO
   13  PROMOTE THE SUCCESS AND EXPANSION OF SMALL BUSINESS IN THE STATE AND THE
   14  GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT OF THE STATE'S ECONOMY AS  A  PUBLIC  PURPOSE  BY
   15  FOSTERING  THE  CREATION  AND  OPERATION OF ADDITIONAL BUSINESS OUTREACH
   16  CENTERS AND INCREASING STATE ASSISTANCE TO THE BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTERS
   17  (BOC) NETWORK, INCORPORATED,  A  NOT-FOR-PROFIT  CORPORATION  PERFORMING
   18  VITAL AND WORTHY STATE AND PUBLIC PURPOSES.
   19    S 217. BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTERS. 1. THERE IS HEREBY ESTABLISHED WITH-
   20  IN  THE  DEPARTMENT  A BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTER (BOC) NETWORK ASSISTANCE
   21  PROGRAM. THE DEPARTMENT IS AUTHORIZED, WITHIN AMOUNTS  APPROPRIATED,  TO
   22  PROVIDE  DIRECT  TECHNICAL  AND  FINANCIAL  ASSISTANCE  TO  THE BUSINESS
   23  OUTREACH CENTER (BOC) NETWORK,  INCORPORATED,  A  NOT-FOR-PROFIT  CORPO-
   24  RATION, FOR THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES:

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD05789-01-1

       A. 2266                             2

    1    (A)  TO  ASSIST  THE BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTER (BOC) NETWORK IN SETTING
    2  UP, OR TO ASSIST THE  CENTER  IN  HELPING  LOCAL  SPONSOR  ORGANIZATIONS
    3  AND/OR NEW ORGANIZATIONS TO SET UP ADDITIONAL BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTERS,
    4  IN  GEOGRAPHIC  AREAS  OF  THE STATE THAT ARE WIDELY-SEPARATED FROM EACH
    5  OTHER  BUT ARE IN NEED OF, AND WOULD LIKELY BENEFIT FROM, THE ESTABLISH-
    6  MENT OF SUCH CENTER;
    7    (B) TO ASSIST THE BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTER (BOC) NETWORK IN  PROVIDING
    8  AID  FOR  THE  OPERATION  AND  MAINTENANCE  OF  THE  ADDITIONAL BUSINESS
    9  OUTREACH CENTERS SO CREATED AS WELL AS FOR THE OPERATION AND MAINTENANCE
   10  OF ITS PRESENTLY EXISTING AFFILIATED BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTERS; AND
   11    (C) TO ASSIST THE BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTER (BOC) NETWORK TO EXPAND THE
   12  CENTER'S COORDINATION OF NETWORKING AND TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE  ACTIVITIES
   13  AMONG ALL BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTERS.
   14    2.  THE  DEPARTMENT  SHALL  PROVIDE MONIES, WITHIN AVAILABLE APPROPRI-
   15  ATIONS, IN RESPONSE TO  A  COMMUNITY  NEED  FOR  THE  BUSINESS  OUTREACH
   16  CENTERS  NETWORK.  THE DEPARTMENT SHALL ESTABLISH CRITERIA FOR SELECTION
   17  AND DESIGNATION OF SUCH BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTERS  WHICH  SHALL  INCLUDE
   18  BUT NOT BE LIMITED TO:
   19    (A)  COMMUNITIES THAT ARE GEOGRAPHICALLY AND/OR SOCIALLY ISOLATED FROM
   20  THE MAINSTREAM ECONOMY;
   21    (B) A COORDINATED NETWORK  OF  CLIENT  INFORMATION  SYSTEMS,  REGIONAL
   22  LINKAGES, AND OPERATIONAL GUIDELINES;
   23    (C)  A  MODEL  THAT  MAXIMIZES  THE  EFFICIENT  USE OF SCARCE EXISTING
   24  ECONOMIC  DEVELOPMENT  RESOURCES,  ADDRESSES  THE  RECOGNIZED  NEED  FOR
   25  PRE-LOAN AND POST LOAN TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE FOR GROWING SMALL BUSINESS;
   26    (D)  FACILITATING  ACCESS  TO  THE  COMPLEX INFRASTRUCTURE OF ECONOMIC
   27  DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS AND SMALL BUSINESS SERVICES, CONNECTING SMALL BUSI-
   28  NESS TO NEEDED INFORMATION AND CAPITAL TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE.
   29    3. ASSISTANCE, SERVICES AND DATA AS  WILL  ENABLE  THE  DEPARTMENT  TO
   30  PROPERLY  CARRY OUT ITS FUNCTIONS, POWERS, AND DUTIES UNDER THIS ARTICLE
   31  SHALL BE PROVIDED BY THE COMMISSIONER AND TO ACCOMPLISH  THE  SAME,  THE
   32  COMMISSIONER  MAY  REQUEST  THE  ASSISTANCE OF OTHER AGENCIES AND PUBLIC
   33  CORPORATIONS AND DISTRICTS PURSUANT TO SECTION TWO  HUNDRED  SIXTEEN  OF
   34  THIS ARTICLE.
   35    S  218. REPORTING REQUIREMENT. THE DEPARTMENT SHALL MONITOR THE EFFEC-
   36  TIVENESS OF THE DIRECT TECHNICAL AND FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE IT PROVIDES TO
   37  THE BUSINESS OUTREACH CENTER (BOC) NETWORK, INCORPORATED,  IN  ORDER  TO
   38  DETERMINE  AND REPORT TO WHAT EXTENT THE GOALS SPECIFIED IN THIS SECTION
   39  HAVE BEEN ACHIEVED. THE COMMISSIONER  SHALL  MAKE  AND  FILE  AN  ANNUAL
   40  REPORT TO THE GOVERNOR, TEMPORARY PRESIDENT OF THE SENATE AND SPEAKER OF
   41  THE  ASSEMBLY  WITHIN  THIRTY  DAYS  FOLLOWING  THE CLOSE OF THE STATE'S
   42  FISCAL YEAR CONTAINING THE RESULTS OF SUCH MONITORING PURSUANT  TO  THIS
   43  SECTION.  SUCH  ANNUAL  REPORT SHALL CONTAIN RECOMMENDATIONS FOR FURTHER
   44  LEGISLATION TO IMPLEMENT THE PURPOSES OF THIS ARTICLE IF IN THE JUDGMENT
   45  OF THE COMMISSIONER NEW LEGISLATION TO FURTHER EFFECTUATE  THE  PURPOSES
   46  OF THIS ARTICLE IS WARRANTED.
   47    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   48  it shall have become a law.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to creating the business outreach center network assistance program
